cause.description:
A group of likeminded individuals dedicated to restoring sanity and reason to American politics by electing Dennis Kucinich to the presidency.
1. International laws and treaties should be respected.
2. Health Care should be avaliable to all.
3. Power to the people, not the corporations.
cause.mission: Elect Dennis Kucinich president of the United States of America
cause.name: Dennis Kucinich for President
